page.title: 01GAZETTEER
page.content: WHITWELL GAZETTEER Whitwell has a population of about 1200 people.It has watercress beds and a trout farm.It has a garage called Roberts.There are clubs and societies in Whitwell.There is a village policeman,a doctor,a barber and a district nurse.There are 3 pubs:The Maiden's Head,The Bull and The Eagle and Child.St.Paul's Walden Bury is owned by the Bowes Lyon family. Whitwell has four shops,Robarts,Charts Cressman's Corner and Wakefields (The Butchers).Whitwell has a primary school and a nursery school.The primary school has 88 children and the nursery school has 32 children. Whitwell has 5 farms:Bonfields Dairy farm (110 acres),Bury Farm (1000 acres ) (nr.hamlet of Bendish pop.70), Clarkes Dairy Farm (600 acres) and Hardings Farm (1300 acres)
